name: bos-component-ts-starter
description: TypeScript project starter for NEAR BOS

scripts.build: npm run fmt && rimraf .bos/transpiled && mkdir -p .bos/transpiled/src && sucrase ./src -d .bos/transpiled/src/npm_package_name --transforms typescript,jsx --jsx-runtime preserve --disable-es-transforms --out-extension jsx && node ./build.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd .bos/transpiled && bos components deploy

author: frol.near
